article: Would you send a monkey to do your shopping for you? Sounds very strange, doesn't it ? But monkeys can be trained to do some wonderful things. Most people know that monkeys are one of _ cleverest beasts . Scientists have been studying the connection _ monkeys and people for a long time. They have done experiments that test _ monkeys are able to do simple things. In one test, a scientist put two monkeys in two cages beside each other. Each cage had a machine. One cage had a machine which gave out water. The other had one which gave out food. Each monkey was given a bag of black and white coins. The black coins worked _ in the food machine. The white coins worked in the machine with the _ . After some time, both animals were able to know which coin worked in which machine. Then the test was made _ . The coin s were taken away. The monkey with the water machine was not allowed to have any water for twenty-four hours. The food monkey was prevented from _ any food. The next day, the coins were returned to the monkeys. This time, _ , the monkey with the food machine was given coins for water machine, and the monkey with the water machine was given the coins that worked in the food machine. What did the two _ monkeys do? The two clever monkeys _ through the bars of their cages and _ coins with each other.
